properties.name: center
properties.description: Center of map, which view point should be focus on initially.

properties.name: disable-double-click-zoom
properties.description: Whether double click can help user zoom into map or not.

properties.name: scroll-wheel
properties.description: Whether mouse scroll can help user zoom into or out of map.

properties.name: is-move-insert
properties.description: Whether components in map are re-drawn when map moves or when map is finished dragging.

properties.name: zoom-control
properties.description: Whether zoom controls are available on map or not.

properties.name: scale-control
properties.description: Whether scale controls are available on map or not.

events.name: click
events.description: Raised when user clicks on map.

events.name: double-click
events.description: Raised when user double clicks on map.

events.name: right-click
events.description: Raised when user right clicks on map.

events.name: zoom-start
events.description: Raised when user starts zooming on map.

events.name: zoom-end
events.description: Raised when user finishes zooming on map.

events.name: drag-start
events.description: Raised when user starts dragging map.

events.name: drag
events.description: Raised when user is dragging map.

events.name: drag-end
events.description: Raised when user finishes dragging map.

events.name: map-type-id-changed
events.description: Raised when map type id is changed.

events.name: mouse-over
events.description: Raised when mouse moves over map.

events.name: mouse-out
events.description: Raised when mouse moves from map to its outside.

events.name: center-changed
events.description: Raised when center of map is changed.

events.name: zoom-changed
events.description: Raised when zoom level of map is changed.

events.name: bound-change
events.description: Raised when map boundary is changed.
